description.ko: AQUA-5와 함께 미지의 세계로 여정을 떠나세요. 심해의 압도적인 수압을 견디도록 설계된 이 기체는 첨단 생물 발광 기술과 강화 티타늄 프레임을 결합하여 마리아나 해구의 숨겨진 경이로움을 밝혀냅니다.
description.en: Journey into the unknown with AQUA-5. Engineered to withstand the crushing pressures of the deep ocean, this vessel combines advanced bioluminescent technology with a reinforced titanium frame, revealing the hidden wonders of the Mariana Trench.

prompt: Cinematic shot of a futuristic underwater vessel named AQUA-5 navigating the dark, abyssal zone of the ocean. The craft features glowing cyan neon accents and a sleek titanium hull. Surrounding the vessel are bioluminescent deep-sea creatures and shimmering particles in the dark water. High-pressure atmosphere, hyper-realistic textures, 8k resolution, dramatic lighting, deep navy and turquoise color grade.
